title: Look Back
description: The overly confident Fujino and the shut-in Kyomoto couldnâ€™t be more different, but a love of drawing manga brings these two small-town girls together. A poignant story of growing up and moving forward that only Tatsuki Fujimoto, the creator of Chainsaw Man, could have crafted.Two young artists from a small town inspire each other to improve their art and become manga creators. But as they grow up, a terrible tragedy will change their lives forever.
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
